sentence.Network_en: This year he has left for St Louis early to acclimatise himself.
sentence.Network_cn: 今年他早早地前往圣路易斯以便适应新环境。

sentence.Network_en: Bremer and Garland harmonize on the title song, "Meet Me in St. Louis".
sentence.Network_cn: 布雷默和加兰为主题曲《相逢圣路易斯》配和声。

sentence.Network_en: Fontbonne is a liberal arts college, located in a residential suburb of St. Louis.
sentence.Network_cn: 芳邦大学是一所文科大学，位于圣路易斯市郊的居民区。

means.word_mean: 1. island in Paris on the Seine
